short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An application for picking colors from the screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hey there! Tired of struggling with clunky color pickers? Meet Color Picker App - your new best
friend for grabbing colors effortlessly. This lightweight tool makes it a breeze to snatch colors
from anywhere on your screen, no fuss or frills. Whether you're a design pro or just love adding a
splash of color to your projects, Color Picker App has got you covered. Say goodbye to the
headache of complicated tools and hello to easy-peasy color picking!
